trans-unit.source: Specifies the order of XML Digital Signature and XML Encryption operations when both are performed on the same document.
The XmlDecryptionTransform class provides a transform that determines the order of XML Digital Signature and XML Encryption operations when both are performed on the same document.
Use the XmlDecryptionTransform class whenever you need to perform XML encryption and apply an XML digital signature to the same XML document.

You must pass an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A> property that contains the necessary key information to decrypt the document.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> class.
Adds a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to exclude from processing.
A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to exclude from processing
The uri parameter is .
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml"></xref> object that contains information about the keys necessary to decrypt an XML document.
You must pass an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object to the EncryptedXml property that contains the necessary key information to decrypt the document.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml"></xref> object that contains information about the keys necessary to decrypt an XML document.

Returns an XML representation of the parameters of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.

A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
A decryption key could not be found.
Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
The type of the output to return.
<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> is the only valid type for this parameter.
The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
The type parameter is not an object.

Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object.

The array returned by the InputTypes property must contain at least one element because every <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> object must accept at least one type as valid input.

An <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object.
Determines whether the ID attribute of an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object matches a specified value.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object with an ID attribute to compare with `idValue`.
The value to compare with the ID attribute of `inputElement`.
if the ID attribute of the inputElement parameter matches the idValue parameter; otherwise, .

Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object as transform-specific content of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element and configures the internal state of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object to match the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
This method is used to process subelements of a `<Transform>` element.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object that specifies transform-specific content for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object.
The nodeList parameter is .
-or- The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) value of an object in nodeList was not found.
-or- The length of the URI value of an object in nodeList is 0.
-or- The first character of the URI value of an object in nodeList is not '#'.
When overridden in a derived class, loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object.
The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object.
The obj parameter is .

Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object.
The array returned by the OutputTypes property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.

An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform"></xref> object.
